boardgame.name: Risiko: Star Wars Die Original Trilogie
Risk: Star Wars Edición Trilogía Original
Risk: Star Wars Édition Trilogie
Risk: Star Wars Original Trilogy Edition
boardgame.description: 2 to 5 players _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; ages 10 and up_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are 3 factions in the game, each with its own victory conditions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; The Rebellion must find and destroy the Emperor, who will be hiding at one of his Imperial Bases. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; The Empire must eliminate all Rebel forces. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; The Hutts must take control of 10 out of the 13 resource planets._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players choose to play as the Rebels, Empire, or Hutts and battle for domination of the Galaxy. The Empire can use the Death Star to terrorize all and the Rebels can grow in the Force as the game goes on by attacking Imperial Bases. Heroes and villains like Luke, Han, Darth Vader, and Boba Fett come into play on the many faction cards that can be played throughout the game. Each faction can enhance their attack with ships._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game includes 2 Death Stars and enough sculpted pieces representing the Rebels, Empire, and Hutt factions for 5 players. The Risk game play has been updated and enhanced with cards, ships, and The Force to represent the Star Wars Original Trilogy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implemented by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Risk: Mass Effect Galaxy at War Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

New in shrink. International buyers welcome. Unfortunately game is too large to fit in a flat rate box, so will give shipping estimate once I get a zip code from you. Will take paypal, M.O. or personal check. Personal checks need to clear before shipping.
In original shrink. shipping price is actual cost via USPS Priority from 22305.
New in original shrink. No tears in the shrink, and no dings or dents in the box. Too large to fit in a flat rate box, so let me know your zip code and I will give you a shipping estimate.

Risk Star Wars Original Trilogy Edition (2006) from Parker Brothers Brand New and In Shrink-Wrap! SHIPPING U.S. shipping will be via USPS Priority Shipping and based on a weight of 4 Lbs. International buyers are very welcome, but please contact me for a shipping price quote to avoid any surprises or misunderstandings. I will gladly combine shipping for multiple purchases. The final cost will be based on the total weight, but be aware that large packages that are shipped more than a certain distance accrue a large surcharge, so combining shipping may not save any money.

I purchased this game new and only punched out the counters. Everything is untouched and still in bags/original plastic. The board was opened 1x and the map was somewhat misaligned when printed, leaving some gray stripes on two corners. The Box corners have minor denting form shelf wear but the box is otherwise in excellent condition I ship Fedex ground within the continental united states which will be under 10 US dollars and substantially cheaper if you allow me to ship to a business. All other shipping will be by USPS which will likely be much more expensive unless it is under 4 lbs packed.
Game would be graded As New if there wouldn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be a dent at the left upper corner. Components as new and complete. Can accept paypal or IBAN with BIC Any questions just ask.
Reserved for user: kestril (also includes Risk: Lord of the Rings Trilogy + Hogwarts Cup Challenge) Shipping for Canada will need to be computed.
Game is punched and has minor shelf wear, but is complete.

Opened and sorted but never played - in like new condition. Buyer pays $6.00 shipping. I can try to consolidate shipping costs if you purchase multiple games. Thanks for looking. Local Chicago pickup also available.

Game materials are all present and in like new condition and the cards look as though they have never been played. The _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;problem_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; is the game box. I can make pictures available upon request as I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t think I can describe this well (and it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s more of a problem of the box feel than the appearance). From a short distance the box generally looks very good, but pick it up and look closely and you feel and see what looks like the effect of a modest amount of moisture having coated the box at some point, the result is a rough box and with some warping, particularly the box bottom and one edge. If you want a pristine box, this is obviously not a copy you want. If you are fine with this curious physical flaw you observe when you open and close the game, this might be the copy for you as you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll not notice this feel/warp when the game is on your shelf and like noted, the game materials are in like new condition. Shipping will be $10 to Central and Eastern time zones and $12 to Mountain and Pacific. Other locations please inquire.
I just opened the box to see the components.
played a few times. rulebook shows minimal usage but the rest of the items are in perfect condition.

This is a brand new, still in shrink copy of the game. With the exception of a small (1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;) rip in the shrink wrap, there appears to be no damage at all. Will ship US Priority mail. Other countries please inquire.

Components including the playing pieces, gameboard, cards, and dice are in like new condition. The rule book has some wear and a few minor wrinkles and creases. The box has some very minor shelf wear. Missing one of the Empire faction cards. I store my games in a pet-free and smoke-free environment and I package my games for shipment with the utmost care. I ship quickly - within 24 hours of receiving payment. Shipping weight is 5 pounds.

Game materials are in very good condition, lightly played copy. Box shows some wear, and has some slight dishing. One corner of the box top has a split corner, pretty clean split and could be reinforced on inside pretty easily. Shipping is $10 to Eastern and Central US and $12 to Mountain and Pacific. Other locations please inquire.
Still sealed in shrink wrap. No damage to box. Shipping will be $15 in the US. Shipping outside the US will be calculated based on location.

A few small troops have been misplaced or broken off their base or have a colored head due to a creative youngster. Probably around 5 pieces affected. Everything else i believe is accounted for. If you have questions about the game or shipping let me know! I would love to make a deal! I might do paypal if you ask.

Game is complete, all pieces accounted for including armies, cardboard pieces, rules, dice, and cards. It was played once, so it has been punched, but is otherwise in great shape. The box has a very slight bit of corner wear from storage which is barely noticeable (I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d be happy to provide pictures if you have questions). Game has been stored in a smoke-free home. Buyer to pay shipping based on preference.

Played once. Complete. Great, clean copy! Will ship anywhere, but international bidders beware that shipping with tracking is at least $40 and probably more. Buyer pays full shipping cost. New in Shrink. International buyers, please message me ASAP; I want to get you a shipping estimate before the final order confirmation.

The box lid has a couple of very minor indentations and the rule book has some pen highlighting in the standard Risk section made by the previous owner (refer photo). All parts present are in very good, lightly used condition. Their absence does not prevent the game being played but it should be noted that the following pieces, all of which can be easily substituted/replaced, are missing: 1 yellow Rebel Trooper figure 1 yellow Snowspeeder figure 3 orange Rebel Trooper figures 2 orange Snowspeeder figures 1 grey Stormtrooper figure 1 slave I Hutt ship token 1 Tie Fighter Imperial ship token 2 black 6 sided dice All reasonable offers will be considered. Delivery charges: Within the UK - Special Delivery Next Day including full insurance £10 Outside of the UK - please geekmail before purchasing to determine the delivery charge. Buyer responsible for all Customs charges. Buyer is responsible for all shipping costs, postage for Europe and the rest of the world is by airmail with delivery confirmation/tracking. I can combine multiple purchases to reduce shipping costs where possible. UK buyers can send a personal cheque or use PayPal and add and additional 3.9% (unless the funds are sent as a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Gift_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; under the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Personal_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; tab rather than _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Purchase_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; tab in PayPal). Buyers outside the UK must use PayPal.

for user hiimjosh

English version. All items are new and in shrink if so delivered by the producer. All items are really on stock. No fake set-up here. No Order on demand. International Customers, our precise shipping costs are as follows: DHL International Shipping: Zone 1 (Mostly Europe): 15,00€+1,00€ per two kilos Shipping costs can vary greatly after that and have to be asked for individually. We ship only fully insured. So ordering only a small pocket game or anything very low priced may come out to be very uneconomical. Methods of payment: -You can always pick the game up at our storage location :-) -We accept all credit cards ! -You can use paypal. (That should be the first choice for non-EU customers) Für unsere deutschsprachigen Kunden: Sie können uns für alle Fragen gerne telefonisch kontaktieren: Tel.: 0201-786877 Die Versandkosten innerhalb Deutschlands betragen 5,- Euro (inkl. 19% Mwst.). Ab 100€ versenden wir innerhalb Deutschlands Versandkostenfrei. Alle Preise enthalten die gesetzliche Mehrwertsteuer in Höhe von 19%. Bezahlmöglichkeiten für Kunden innerhalb Deutschlands: - Alle Kreditkarten willkommen ! - Paypal - Vorkasse - Rechnung (Nicht für Erstbesteller, wir behalten uns vor die Zahlungsmöglichkeit per Rechnung von Fall zu Fall neu zu bewerten !)
Alternativ ist natürlich auch eine Abholung mit Bar-, EC-, oder Kreditkartenzahlung in unserem Lager möglich. (Im Geschäft wird neben Brettspielen auch eine üppige Auswahl an Rollenspielen angeboten.) Beachten Sie bitte auch unsere Aktionen und weiter Angebote auf: www. fanen.com Widerrufsbelehrung Widerrufsrecht Sie können Ihre Vertragserklärung innerhalb von zwei Wochen ohne Angabe von Gründen in Textform (z. B. Brief oder E-Mail), oder durch Rücksendung der Sache widerrufen. Die Frist beginnt frühestens mit Erhalt dieser Belehrung. Zur Wahrung der Widerrufsfrist genügt die rechtzeitige Absendung des Widerrufs oder der Sache. Der Widerruf ist zu richten an: Fantasy En_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Counter c/o Holger Willert Gudulastr. 5 D(Hofgebäude rechts hinten) 45131 Essen email: fanen@fanen.com Widerrufsfolgen Im Falle eines wirksamen Widerrufs sind die beiderseits empfangenen Leistungen zurückzugewähren. Können Sie uns die empfangene Leistung ganz oder teilweise nicht oder nur in verschlechtertem Zustand zurückgewähren, müssen Sie uns insoweit ggf. Wertersatz leisten. Bei der Überlassung von Sachen gilt dies nicht, wenn die Verschlechterung der Sache ausschließlich auf deren Prüfung - wie sie Ihnen etwa im Ladengeschäft möglich gewesen wäre - zurückzuführen ist. Im Übrigen können Sie die Wertersatzpflicht vermeiden, indem Sie die Sache nicht wie ein Eigentümer in Gebrauch nehmen und alles unterlassen, was deren Wert beeinträchtigt. Sie haben die Kosten der Rücksendung zu tragen, w enn die gelieferte Ware der bestellten entspricht und wenn der Preis der zurückzusendenden Sache einen Betrag von 40 Euro nicht übersteigt, oder wenn Sie bei einem höheren Preis der Sache zum Zeitpunkt des Widerrufs noch nicht die Gegenleistung, oder eine vertraglich vereinbarte Teilzahlung erbracht haben. Anderenfalls ist die Rücksendung für Sie kostenfrei. Nicht paketversandfähige Sachen werden bei Ihnen abgeholt. Verpflichtungen zur Erstattung von Zahlungen müssen Sie innerhalb von 30 Tagen nach Absendung Ihrer Widerrufserklärung erfüllen.

This is a lot for pieces. Some of the minis and some of the cards are missing. Please contact me for details and we can negotiate something From my trade notes: Has many stand-in pieces. The biggest issues are 1) the missing ship chits for other colors (not sure this matters for 3 player game) and 2) the missing Imperial cards. A card manifest is linked below that you should be able to craft a PnP replacement with. INVENTORY: box has a little wear, nothing out of the ordinary everything in excellent condition board present rules present all of the minis of a normal Risk game are included as stand-ins. The color is a little off in some cases, but it should be playable missing 7 green 5-army pieces missing 3 red 5-army pieces missing 5 yellow 5-army pieces missing 7 white 5-army pieces missing 6 gray 5-army gray pieces missing 8 white 1-army pieces missing 9 red 1-army pieces missing 10 yellow 1-army pieces missing 1 gray 1-army piece [all green 1-army pieces present] [both death stars present] missing 3 orange ship chits (replaced with poker chips) missing 4 yellow ship chits [all green ship chits are present, also have poker chips for them] missing 3 gray ship chits missing 1 white ship chits (replaced with poker chips) [all asteroid tokens present] missing 3 imperial guard tokens [replaced all with poker chips] all dice present red and green decks both present gray deck is missing 14 cards [was thinking of replacing this with a PnP deck, the card manifest is here: http://boardgamegeek.com/filepage/98351/risk-star-wars-original-trilogy-edition-card-manif]
